title: Adobe Media Encoder CC 2015 (v9.1.0) Multilingual Update 3 by m0
description:
Year: 2015
Version: 2015.1.0 (9.1.0.163)
Developer: Adobe
By assembling: m0nkrus
Platform: Windows x64
Compatible with Seven: full
Language: English / Dutch / Spanish / Italian / Chinese (Simplified) / Chinese (Traditional) / Korean / German / Polish / Portuguese / Russian / Turkish / French / Czech / Swedish / Japanese
Medicine: Present System requirements:

- Intel Core 2 Duo or AMD Phenom II; required to support 64-bit architecture
- 64-bit version of Microsoft Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8 or Windows 8.1
- 4 GB of RAM (8GB recommended)
- 4 GB of free hard disk space for installation. During installation, additional free space required
- Requires additional disk space for files, providing a preview, and other working files (10GB recommended)
- The screen is 1024x768 (recommended 1280x800)
- Hard disk with a speed of at least 7200 rev / min (it is recommended to use multiple fast hard disks)
- To use QuickTime features require installation of QuickTime 7.6.6
- Optional: Adobe-certified GPU for hardware acceleration
- To access the Web services require a broadband Internet connection and registration Description:

Adobe Media Encoder CC 2015 - a program coding that lets you encode audio and video files in a variety of distribution formats for different applications and audiences. These video and audio formats are characterized by high compression ratio. Using this program, you can export video in formats suitable for devices ranging from DVD-players and web sites to mobile phones, portable media players and TV standard and high definition. It is important that Adobe Media Encoder CS 2015 can handle multiple video and audio clips in a batch mode; in environments where video is a significant part of the contents, batch processing speeds up workflow. During encoding video, you can add, reorder, and change the encoding settings of files in the batch processing queue. Adobe Media Encoder CC 2015 supports a variety of video export formats depending on the applications Adobe, installed together with this program. In particular, it is the core coding for Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects and Adobe Prelude. However, the program can be used as independent coding means

List of changes
What changed me: 

- A number of the original files for patched installer replaced (cracked PainteR), so the opportunity to integrate the updates in the distribution.
- The distribution integrated update for Adobe Media Encoder CC 2015 to version 9.1.0.163.
- The distribution is integrated plug that prevents the installation of spyware mandatory update for Adobe Application Manager Update to version 14.
- The distribution is integrated with the utility Adobe Update Managment Tool 8.0 (developed PainteR), which allows you to set the "cloud" update.
- In the folder Crack inside the image are a set of tools and simple instructions to register the Adobe Media Encoder 2015 CC.
- By kutsemu installer ESD-version added a menu similar to the Box-version. It made it in the image and likeness of a similar menu for the product family CS4.

Activation Instructions: 

1. Run the installation of Adobe Media Encoder CC 2015 (file autoplay.exe), accept the license agreement and continue the installation nominally Adobe Media Encoder CC 2015 until its end. With the end of the installation, click "Close" (Close), and not a "Run Now" (Launch Now)!
NOTE: If you want to install Adobe Update Management Tool, included in the package, but you UMT currently already is present in the system (for example, an earlier version), before starting the installation, you must remove the existing version of this already. Otherwise, the deployment of the entire package at some point will be forced interrupted, and installation is complete!
2. When installation is complete, run the patch adobe.snr.patch-painter.exe from folder Crack, the drop-down menu, select "Adobe Media Encoder CC 2015 (64-Bit)" and click Patch.
3. Enjoy the registered version of the product!
